Class Rule

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogicalFormula, Term, ToDOM, ToJSON, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Term>
    public class Rule
extends LiteralImpl
    A rule is a Literal (head) with a body, as in "a :- b & c".
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
